ing: 1 pinch dried oregano, or to taste
1 pinch dried parsley, or to taste
des: "This delicious salsa is very easy to make and you can add or take out spices and herbs to your taste. This is a fun recipe for kids to make and experiment with."
ins:
Combine onion and garlic in a food processor; process until finely chopped.
Pour tomatoes into a bowl. Stir in chopped onion and garlic. Add cilantro, cumin, oregano, and parsley.
